new_WTPdata$MSPSS_MC<-NA 
new_WTPdata$AQ_MC<-NA
new_WTPdata$IRI_EC_MC<-NA
new_WTPdata$IRI_FS_MC<-NA
new_WTPdata$IRI_PD_MC<-NA
new_WTPdata$IRI_PT_MC<-NA
new_WTPdata$RSE_MC<-NA

new_WTPdata$MSPSS_MC<-new_WTPdata$MSPSS-mean(new_WTPdata$MSPSS)
new_WTPdata$AQ_MC<-new_WTPdata$AQ-mean(new_WTPdata$AQ)
new_WTPdata$IRI_EC_MC<-new_WTPdata$IRI_EC-mean(new_WTPdata$IRI_EC)
new_WTPdata$IRI_FS_MC<-new_WTPdata$IRI_FS-mean(new_WTPdata$IRI_FS)
new_WTPdata$IRI_PD_MC<-new_WTPdata$IRI_PD-mean(new_WTPdata$IRI_PD)
new_WTPdata$IRI_PT_MC<-new_WTPdata$IRI_PT-mean(new_WTPdata$IRI_PT)
new_WTPdata$RSE_MC<-new_WTPdata$RSE_MC-mean(new_WTPdata$RSE_MC)
```{r}
#set working directory
setwd('~/Desktop/R_files/')
new_WTPdata<-read.csv(file='BALANCED_longformat.csv',header = TRUE,sep = ',')
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
# library(sjPlot)
```
```
```{r}
glm1<-glmer(exp_chosen~social_money+nonsocial_money+MSPSS+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"))

glm2<-glmer(exp_chosen~social_money+nonsocial_money+MSPSS_MC+AQ_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"))

glm3<-glmer(exp_chosen~social_money+nonsocial_money+MSPSS_MC+AQ_MC+IRI_EC_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

glm4<-glmer(exp_chosen~social_money+nonsocial_money+MSPSS_MC+AQ_MC+IRI_FS_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

glm5<-glmer(exp_chosen~social_money+nonsocial_money+MSPSS_MC+AQ_MC+IRI_PD_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

glm6<-glmer(exp_chosen~social_money+nonsocial_money+MSPSS_MC+AQ_MC+IRI_PT_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

glm7<-glmer(exp_chosen~social_money+nonsocial_money+MSPSS_MC+AQ_MC+RSE_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

glm8<-glmer(exp_chosen~nonsocial_money+social_money*AQ_MC+MSPSS_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

glm9<-glmer(exp_chosen~nonsocial_money+social_money*AQ_MC+social_money*MSPSS_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))

glm10<-glmer(exp_chosen~nonsocial_money+social_money*IRI_EC_MC+social_money*MSPSS_MC+(1|subid), data=new_WTPdata, family = binomial(link = "logit"),control=glmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))
```

```{r}

old_WTPdata<-read.csv(file='UNBALANCED_longformat.csv',header = TRUE,sep = ',')
```


```{r}

old_WTPdata$MSPSS_MC<-NA
old_WTPdata$AQ_MC<-NA
old_WTPdata$IRI_EC_MC<-NA

old_WTPdata$MSPSS_MC<-old_WTPdata$MSPSS-mean(old_WTPdata$MSPSS)
old_WTPdata$AQ_MC<-old_WTPdata$AQ-mean(old_WTPdata$AQ)
old_WTPdata$IRI_EC_MC<-old_WTPdata$IRI_EC-mean(old_WTPdata$IRI_EC)
old_WTPdata$IRI_FS_MC<-old_WTPdata$IRI_FS-mean(old_WTPdata$IRI_FS)
old_WTPdata$IRI_PD_MC<-old_WTPdata$IRI_PD-mean(old_WTPdata$IRI_PD)
old_WTPdata$IRI_PT_MC<-old_WTPdata$IRI_PT-mean(old_WTPdata$IRI_PT)
old_WTPdata$RSE_MC<-old_WTPdata$RSE_MC-mean(old_WTPdata$RSE_MC)
```
